title: What font is used on this header, the big title and description.
content:
What font is used on this header, the big title and description.

[http://2.s3.envato.com/files/77979285/Theme%20Preview/01-Spirits-Homepag...](http://web.archive.org/web/20140405092434/http:/2.s3.envato.com/files/77979285/Theme%20Preview/01-Spirits-Homepage-1.png "http://2.s3.envato.com/files/77979285/Theme%20Preview/01-Spirits-Homepage-1.png")

author: sinols

comments.content: Could be [Lato](http://web.archive.org/web/20140405092434/http:/www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/lato) by tyPoland Lukasz Dziedzic.
Hmm.. No, look at the L and Y. They afre different.
